name: DynamicTiledSpriteChanger
shortDescription: Change the tiled sprite of your object to another dynamically.
description: With this tool you will be able to change the sprites of your objects dynamically, which will allow for various business rules, such as a floor that changes theme automatically or skins for your character.
This extension was made thinking about the template that I will soon sell for a complex character customization scene for RPG.
The extension is for community and non-profit use, please use it giving due credit to me and @arthuro555 who made the extension I based it on "Load images from a URL". My thanks @arthuro555.

eventsFunctions.description: Replaces the image contained by a sprite by a new one, from a URL. This will only affect the sprite in question and only until the image in it is changed through its animation or another action, unless you also modify the resource.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load Path/URL into a tiled sprite
eventsFunctions.name: ChangeSpriteOfTiledSpriteFromPathOrURL
eventsFunctions.sentence: Load PATH/URL String _PARAM1_ into sprite _PARAM2_ and change height _PARAM3_  and change width _PARAM4_ (and into the corresponding resource: _PARAM5_)

inlineCode: //Resolver o problema de ordem de renderização. Do jeito que esta apenas o primeiro item é modificado.

parameters.description: The Path/URL to load the new image for the tiled sprite from
parameters.name: Path_URL

parameters.description: Altura em pixels do seu spritesheet (altura total, não dos frames)
parameters.name: SpriteSheetHeight

parameters.description: Largura em pixels do seu spritesheet (altura total, não dos frames)
parameters.name: SpriteSheetWidth

parameters.longDescription: If yes, modifies the image contained in the resource of the sprite's current frame instead of just the sprite's displayed image. This makes the changes affect all other sprites that also display this resource, and allows the change to persist after changing animations or the current frame.
parameters.name: ChangeResource
